gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 129, Suns 120
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Trae Young’s 32 points (7-11 3PT FG) and 15 assists, the Hawks defeated the Suns, 129-120. Bogdan Bogdanovic (23 points) and Dejounte Murray (22 points, eight rebounds, five assists) added a combined 45 points for the Hawks in the victory, while Kevin Durant tallied 35 points, eight rebounds and eight assists for the Suns in the losing effort. The Hawks win their third straight game as they improve to 21-27 on the season, while the Suns fall to 28-21.
